org.fedoraproject.xmvn.resolver.impl

Class AtomicFileCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fedoraproject.xmvn.resolver.impl.AtomicFileCounter

  • class AtomicFileCounter
extends java.lang.Object
    Atomic integer object, which stores its value in a text file.
    Author:
    Mikolaj Izdebski
